product_name: Seattle Sports E-Merse DryMax Clear 3D Camera Case - Small
long_description: The small Seattle Sports E-Merse DryMax Clear 3D camera case offers great protection and allows you to operate point-and-shoot cameras and take pictures right through the case.
short_description: The small Seattle Sports E-Merse DryMax Clear 3D camera case offers great protection and allows you to operate point-and-shoot cameras and take pictures right through the case.
